description: Convert the last term from decimal to binary!.
comments: The next term, a(6), has 330 digits. [From Harvey P. Dale, Aug 10 2011]
references: C. Pickover, Mazes for the Mind, St. Martin's Press, NY, 1992, p. 350.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: The next term is too large to include.
